callback_with_context.context_function_id: this | Key.Contains("khorne") => "UI_CAM_Click_Daemons_Progression_Khorne" | Key.Contains("nurgle") => "UI_CAM_Click_Daemons_Progression_Nurgle" | Key.Contains("undivided") => "UI_CAM_Click_Daemons_Progression_Undivided" | Key.Contains("slaanesh") => "UI_CAM_Click_Daemons_Progression_Slaanesh" | Key.Contains("tzeentch") => "UI_CAM_Click_Daemons_Progression_Tzeentch"

localised_text.tooltip_text: Character Details||View the Daemon Prince's chosen Daemonic Gifts and skills.

icon_new_equipment.comment: In prologue show if any item unlocked, in non-prologue only show if armory pieces unlocked as ancillaries could be a bit spammy

magic_effect_outer.comment: should only show when ascend button is active, and after ascending

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Join(ActiveThresholdSetList, AvailableThresholdSetList, AchievementThresholdSetList.Filter(IsLockedByAchievement) ).Filter(CampaignOperationSetList.Any( ArmoryItemList.IsEmpty == false) && LowerBound > StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignPooledResource").InitialMax).Sort(LowerBound, true)
